title: Atlassian security advisory (AV25-284)
description: On May 20, 2025, Atlassian published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Bamboo Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Confluence Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Jira Data Center and Server  multiple versions
Jira Service Management Data Center and Server  multiple versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
